EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Zipkin! To learn more about or get involved with the project visit OpenZipkin <[[http://zipkin.io/]]> and GitHub <[[https://github.com/openzipkin]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, donâ€™t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email-confirmation&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=asset-download-confirmation]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
